roleset.name: impossible, totally unlikely

role.descr: person who cannot conceive of X
attribute of X, what it's inconceivable AS

example.name: With it EXP
example.text: It *EXP* is inconceivable that you take a multivitamin in good faith and it wrecks havoc on your health in such a profound way but that is the case .
example.arg: that you take a multivitamin in good faith and it wrecks havoc on your health in such a profound way

example.name: With arg0
example.text: It *EXP* is inconceivable to me that a million or three million or half a million human beings will think and feel precisely the same way on any single subject.
example.arg: that a million or three million or half a million human beings will think and feel precisely the same way on any single subject.

example.name: With attribute
example.text: Man is already a member of a social body when he appears as a thinking, willing creature, for the thinking man is inconceivable as a solitary individual.

roleset.note: INCONCEIVABLE-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. Comparison to conceive-v.01. (from inconceivable.01-j)
